author: Gary J. Milne
releaseNotes:
Package-138: Improves on/off handling for power relays.
Package-137: Adds OBIS power monitoring values to the Universal Multi-Sensor Trigger Eligibility list.
Package-136: Adds support for OBIS energy monitoring driver to Universal_Multi_Sensor.
 Adds ability for multi-relays to optionally create child devices. V1.3.4 fixes a bug in power profile switches.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Color Bulb
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for color bulb, also supports CT mode. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Dimmer Switch
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for dimmer switch. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Dual Relay/Switch/Plug
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for Dual Relay/Switch/Plug with optional Energy Monitoring. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Fan
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for fan with switch. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Single Relay/Switch/Plug
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for Dual Relay/Switch/Plug with optional Energy Monitoring. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Eight Relay/Switch/Plug
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for Eight Relay/Switch/Plug, no Energy Monitoring. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Triple Relay/Switch/Plug
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for Triple Relay/Switch/Plug, no Energy Monitoring. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Quad Relay/Switch/Plug
drivers.description: Tasmota Sync driver for Quad Relay/Switch/Plug, no Energy Monitoring. Provides native and realtime synchronization with standard Tasmota 11 or greater. Polling available for earlier versions.

drivers.name: Tasmota Sync - Universal Multi Sensor Single Relay
Tasmota Sync - Universal Multi Sensor Double Relay
